Text:
There is a full READY-TO-BURN dvd... including 5.1 audio, menus and stuff .. just like the original media..  You can also emulate it with some image program such as daemon tools , resize it with dvd shrink ... separate it into a single file ( show itself ) and rip it to .AVI. 

happy messin' around with it.

Katatonia 端bber alles!
